description:
The USGS GAP/LANDFIRE National Terrestrial Ecosystems data, based on the NatureServe Ecological Systems Classification, are the foundation of the most detailed, consistent map of vegetation available for the United States.  These data facilitate planning and management for biological diversity on a regional and national scale.

This dataset includes the land cover component of the GAP Analyais project.
